content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I understand you need electrical work done. May I please have your name to get started?
Thanks, Mark! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Checking if we cover 789 Oak Street, Springfield for service.
I'm sorry, but it seems I cannot verify that address in our system. Could you please double-check and provide it again?
Yeah, it's definitely 789 Oak Street, Springfield. Maybe try 789 Oak St.?

Still unable to verify the address 789 Oak St., Springfield in our service area. Unfortunately, I cannot proceed without a valid service location. If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team directly. Thank you for understanding.
reason: Address not in service area or invalid
